title: How to Make Watermelon Lemonade

steps.headline: Place the watermelon cubes, raspberries and water in the container of the blender.
steps.description: Cover and blend until smooth. If you do not have a blender, just mash the pieces up with a fork.

steps.headline: Strain the mixture through a fine mesh strainer into a pitcher.
Stir in the sugar and lemon juice until sugar dissolves.
Serve.
steps.description: This recipe should make four servings for an average glass size. Add a small wedge of watermelon to the side of the glass for an extra garnish if liked, plus a sprig of mint.

text: Place the watermelon cubes, raspberries and water in the container of the blender. Cover and blend until smooth. If you do not have a blender, just mash the pieces up with a fork. Strain the mixture through a fine mesh strainer into a pitcher.  Stir in the sugar and lemon juice until sugar dissolves. Refrigerate until chilled, about 1 hour. Serve. This recipe should make four servings for an average glass size. Add a small wedge of watermelon to the side of the glass for an extra garnish if liked, plus a sprig of mint. Finished.
